程序包 engine.android.core.extra

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    EventBus.EventHandler
    事件处理器（在主线程处理）
    EventBus.EventProcessor
    事件处理器（在当前线程处理）
    JavaBeanAdapter.FilterMatcher<T>  
    JavaBeanLoader.ConfigChange
    Helper for determining if the configuration has changed in an interesting way so we need to rebuild the data.
    SplashScreen.SplashCallback  
    SplashScreen.SplashLoading  
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    EventBus
    事件总线 功能：事件监听及发送机制
    EventBus.Event
    传输事件
    FragmentPagerAdapter
    Implementation of PagerAdapter that represents each page as a Fragment that is persistently kept in the fragment manager as long as the user can return to the page.
    JavaBeanAdapter<T>  
    JavaBeanAdapter.JavaBeanCursorAdapter
    配合CursorLoader使用
    JavaBeanAdapter.ViewHolder
    缓存View，提高效率
    JavaBeanLoader<D>
    配合JavaBeanAdapter使用
    SplashScreen
    闪屏机制
